mapper.insert: insert into t_user_rela ( rela_id, rela_user_id, rela_friend_id, rela_status, rela_friend_phone, rela_friend_remark, rela_friend_desc, rela_auth, rela_not_see_me, rela_not_see_him, rela_create_time ) values ( #{relaId}, #{relaUserId}, #{relaFriendId}, #{relaStatus}, #{relaFriendPhone}, #{relaFriendRemark}, #{relaFriendDesc}, #{relaAuth}, #{relaNotSeeMe}, #{relaNotSeeHim}, now() )
mapper.update: update t_user_rela set rela_friend_remark = #{relaFriendRemark}, rela_auth = #{relaAuth}, rela_not_see_me = #{relaNotSeeMe}, rela_not_see_him = #{relaNotSeeHim}, rela_update_time = now() where rela_id = #{relaId}
mapper.select: select u.* from t_user_rela ur left join t_user u on ur.rela_friend_id = u.user_id where ur.rela_user_id = #{userId} and rela_status = '1'
